thread.title: Pentagon considers sending combat troops into Syria
thread.title_full: Pentagon considers sending combat troops into Syria

author: Dennis Shanahan
title: Pentagon considers sending combat troops into Syria
text:
US POLITICS Pentagon considers sending combat troops into Syria Donald Trump sits down for lunch with troops during a visit to the US Central Command at MacDill air force base. Picture; AFP. The Australian X 
The US Defence Department is considering boots on the ground in northern Syria in an attempt to speed up the battle against Islamic State. 
The Pentagon is planning a proposal for combat troops to join the coalition’s fight against IS, currently waged by air. 
“It’s possible that you may see conventional forces hit the ground in Syria for some period of time,” a defence official told CNN. However the official emphasised that any decision is ultimately up to the President. 
Donald Trump has ordered his defence secretary to come up with a proposal to combat ISIS before the end of the month. 
If the idea was approved by Mt Trump, it would significantly alter US military operations in Syria where until now only small teams of special operations forces have operated. 
.
